org.matrix.androidsdk.adapters

Class AbstractMessagesAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<MessageRow>
        • org.matrix.androidsdk.adapters.AbstractMessagesAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    public abstract class AbstractMessagesAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<MessageRow>
    Abstract implementation of messages list
